title: Topic 003 Question 023
body: You have a Microsoft Teams Phone deployment that uses Direct Routing and two derived trunks named Trunk1 and Trunk2.
You need to ensure that Teams will route all calls by using Trunk2.
options: From PowerShell, run the Set-CsOnlinePSTNGateway cmdlet.
From the Microsoft Teams admin center, modify the Session Border Controller (SBC) objects.
From PowerShell, run the Set-CsOnlineVoiceRoute cmdlet
From Operator Connect in the Microsoft Teams admin center, modify the My operators settings.
